title: Fix Arbiter State() Pointer Escape and Concurrency Races
recommendation: Add to CLAUDE.md: 'Never return pointers to internal mutable state from synchronized methods. State() returns deep-copied snapshots via Clone(). All types crossing goroutine boundaries need Clone() methods. Run tests with -race flag.' This is a foundational concurrency rule for the entire codebase.

title: ANSI-Aware String Splicing for TUI Overlays
recommendation: Add to CLAUDE.md TUI rules: 'Never use []rune slicing on ANSI-styled strings for visual-column operations. Use ansi.Truncate/TruncateLeft from charmbracelet/x/ansi. Grep for []rune + lipgloss.Width — that combination is always a bug.'

title: Fix Swallowed GenerationErrorMsg in UnifiedApp
recommendation: Add Bubble Tea message routing rule to CLAUDE.md: 'In parent Update() methods, never swallow messages that child views need. Default to fall-through. Only return early for messages exclusively owned by the parent. Error messages must always reach the view layer.'

title: TUI Breadcrumb Header Hidden by Oversized Child View
recommendation: Add layout rule to CLAUDE.md: 'Always subtract chrome dimensions (header, footer, sidebar) from WindowSizeMsg before passing to child views. Children must only know about their allocated space, not full terminal size.'

title: TUI Dimension Mismatch: Parent Padding vs Child Sizing
recommendation: Merge with breadcrumb hidden doc into a single CLAUDE.md rule: 'Pass exact available space (after all parent chrome/padding) to child components. Available Width = Terminal Width - Parent Horizontal Padding. Use ansi.StringWidth for styled text width calculations.'

title: TUI Scrolling - Keyboard and Mouse Focus Issues
recommendation: Add to TUI patterns section: 'Shell layout owns focus state — use shell.Focus() not component.Focused() for routing decisions. Use msg.String() for key matching instead of key.Matches() when dealing with raw key events. Avoid Ctrl+J (= LF/Enter in terminals).'

title: Over-Planning Before Bug Reproduction
recommendation: Add workflow rule to CLAUDE.md: 'Reproduce bugs before planning fixes. Phase 0 (reproduction + failing test) is mandatory before any multi-phase fix plan. If bug cannot be reproduced, document as could-not-reproduce and close.'
